scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/collections
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run prepare:ropsten && graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/collections-ropsten
scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --debug  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/  decentraland/collections-mumbai
